specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work results for "$0" are good, the Qliphoth Counter of "$0" will ▇▇.
When the work results for "$0" are bad, the Qliphoth Counter of "$0" will decrease.
When the PE-BOX extraction during work is between 12 and 16, the agents will experience a slight restoration of their mental state.
When the work result is either good or bad, it triggers the special ability of "$0".
When the Qliphoth Counter of "$0" reaches 0, O-05-102 will escape.

The special ability of $0-1 will set the life and SP (spirit) values of the employees to 200, but it will remove the effects of healing. The special ability of $0-2 will cause the employees to take physical damage.
